feed.title: Kawa Entertainment Asset Feed
feed.subtitle: We are an "adoption" style Vtuber Agency, focusing on Technology. Our mission is to develop our talents and the entire vtubing community.

entry.title: VTS Heartrate Plugin
entry.content:
**Are you looking to do workout / horror streams? Why not connect your heartbeat to VTube Studio?**
#### Info
* Support for many heart rate monitors with pulsoid.net and ANT+! * Configurable model tinting that scales with pulse! * Automatic expression and hotkey triggering at desired heart rate thresholds! * Custom tracking parameters for pulse and breath!
#### About
This plugin is developed by Tom "Skeletom" Farro. If you need to contact him, the best way to do so is [via Twitter](https://twitter.com/FomTarro).
If you're more of an email-oriented person, you can contact his support email: [tom@skeletom.net](mailto:tom@skeletom.net).
#### Usage
Getting up and running is relatively straightforward. The plugin will automatically connect to VTube Studio on launch. From there, do the following steps:
* Input an estimated minimum and maximum heartrate. * Select a desired heartrate input method. You can connect over Bluetooth using your phone and [pulsoid.net](https://www.pulsoid.net/), or connect directly to your PC with an [ANT+](https://www.thisisant.com/consumer/ant-101/what-is-ant) USB dongle. * Add Art Mesh Tint modules and configure them to parts of your model! * Add Expression and Hotkey Trigger modules and configure them to activate model functions automatically! * Hook up Custom Tracking Parameters your model for things like breathing speed!
For the complete guide on all input and output features, [the unabridged readme can be found here](https://github.com/FomTarro/vts-heartrate#readme) (also accessible from within the plugin under **Settings** -> **Open README**).
#### Custom Parameters
This plugin outputs four custom tracking parameters for use. They are as follows:
* `VTS_Heartrate_Linear`: A value that scales from 0.0 to 1.0 as your heartrate moves across the expected range. * `VTS_Heartrate_Pulse`: A value that oscillates between 0.0 and 1.0 with a frequency exactly matching your heartrate. * `VTS_Heartrate_Breath`: A value that oscillates between 0.0 and 1.0 with a frequency slower than Pulse, suitable for controlling your model's ParamBreath output. * `VTS_Heartrate_BPM`: A value that represents the actual current heartrate in BPM.
#### Install instructions
This is a plugin for VTube Studio, so naturally it requires an installation of VTube Studio, which is available for free on Steam.
Simply unzip the folder and run the bundled .exe file to launch the plugin, no installation required.
The plugin will request network permission so as to be able to connect with VTube Studio, and optionally connect with pulsoid.net.

entry.title: Female Vtuber Model Body Base
entry.content:
For those who struggle or want a fast way to do the human anatomy & body layer splitting part. This asset could help you get started.
#### PRODUCT INFO
* THIS PRODUCT IS NOT RIGGED! * This product comes as (.PSD) file contained within a Zip file. * YOU NEED PHOTOSHOP TO OPEN .PSD FILES. * Canvas size in ZIP: 3140 x 7000 * Link (in notepad) to the HD Canvas/ Model size in my Google drive. * Bikini and watermark not included
#### PERSONAL USE LICENSE
**Every purchase for this file is for one single standalone license. If you want to use this file for commercial purposes please read the rules under the commercial license section.**
**CREDITING:** Please Credit @LavandereVT or the @AssetShop if you use the base in any way (as is, for tracing, reference, etc.)
**SELLING:** Selling/ sharing/ redistribution is prohibited on a personal use license even if you edit/ trace/ reference the file.
**RIGGERS:** The only exception for sharing the file is when giving your Vtuber model to a Live2D rigger solely for the purpose of having your model rigged. Riggers must also abide by the rules (it is your job to inform them and keep evidence they agree to the rules).
**CHANGES:** You can change/ add whatever you want, including but not limited too: body shape/ colors/ layers/ facial features/ clothing/ cutting points/ etc.
* You may use this body as a base for character concept designs (if only for personal use) but you may not sell it in adoptions/ etc. unless you bought a commercial license.*
* I cannot guarantee all the layers are split how you will want them to be, if you want more cuts in the model you will have to alter them yourself and have knowledge of how, I cannot teach you. This product is solely a basis for learning and providing aid for the vtuber design process.
* You may not sell your own body-base using this one as a reference/ guide.
#### COMMERCIAL LICENSE
**IF ANYTHING IS UNCLEAR OR YOU ARE NOT SURE ABOUT PLEASE SEND A DM**
**LICENSE:** Each individual variant of a vtuber custom/ commission, artwork adoptable, etc. is considered 1 standalone license to use this file.
* You may not sell/share this file in the same manner in which you bought it here on Etsy, nor do so on other platforms.
* All future clients must abide by the same rules of owning this file. It is your sole responsibility to make them aware of said rules and keep evidence of their agreement in case of legal issues arise.
* All rules from the personal use section also apply (excluding the fact you must share the file to the client who bought the custom work from you)
*If you have issues please DM me. I'll always do my best to help! â™¡*

entry.title: VTube Studio
entry.content:
VTube Studio is the defacto app for Live2D vtubers. The app uses your smartphone or webcam to track your face and animate a [Live2D Cubism Model](https://www.live2d.com/en/). The model is shown directly on your phone or your PC by streaming the face-tracking data over your local network from your phone to your PC/Mac.
#### Usage Example
https://twitter.com/koziichu/status/1540392554775998465?s=20&t=gfcykm4tfkxSspBz3GOh5w
_Wanna see more examples? Just search ["VTube Studio" on Twitter](https://twitter.com/search?q=VTube%20Studio&f=video)._

entry.title: Schedule Studio
entry.content:
A browser-based schedule creation tool with completely custom color combinations built in no Photoshop required! Creating a schedule can become a chore for content creators. Schedule Studio aims to streamline that process, making it easy for anyone to create a schedule when on the go.
`button:/schedule-editor:Open Schedule Studio` `button:https://discord.gg/PVF64McJmU:Join support discord`
#### Here's how to use our schedule creator!
- Open Schedule Studio - Select your template and theme - Edit the colors - Edit the text (by clicking it) - Add your image (by clicking it) - Hit Save - ??? - Profit
#### Example Users
https://twitter.com/funamusea/status/1533284269657042945?s=20&t=PkuMlhYZcaC1sbAoPhMdcg
https://twitter.com/StarryYozzy/status/1523647418805686272?s=20&t=PkuMlhYZcaC1sbAoPhMdcg
_Schedule Studio is free to be used in any context (including commercial), but redistribution or resale is strictly prohibited._

entry.title: Mascot Assets
entry.content:

We've included easy to use .zip files of each mascot. You can import them into [Twitch Integrated Throwing System](https://remasuri3.itch.io/tits "T.I.T.S") like shown below! We've even included some SFX (even if they're... just okay).

entry.title: Klock
entry.content:
So you want a clock in your already amazing streaming overlay? We got you covered! Simply create your favorite clock design using our online editor. Once you've perfected it simply download the klock.html file by pressing the SAVE KLOCK button. Then simply follow the instructions below for settings it up in OBS.
`button:/klock-editor:Open Klock Editor` `button:https://discord.gg/PVF64McJmU:Join support discord`
#### Here's how to set up your very own Klock in OBS!
- Open OBS - Add a new browser source - Make sure local file is checked - Hit browse and locate the klock.html file you downloaded - Configure the width / height / etc as you please - Hit okay - ??? - Profit
#### Example users
https://twitter.com/kawa_entertain/status/1529146483634802692
https://twitter.com/MofutariMegumi/status/1508493647402389506
https://twitter.com/Nami_Miyahara/status/1508031189344522243
_Klock is free to be used in any context (including commercial), but redistribution or resale is strictly prohibited._

entry.title: ViewLink: VR to Live2D
entry.content:
Are you a VTuber that wants to stream VR games, but only have a Live2D model? With ViewLink, you can have your Live2D avatar react to VR gameplay without any fancy setup or additional hardware!
`button:https://kawaentertainment.itch.io/viewlink:Download ViewLink` `button:https://discord.gg/PVF64McJmU:Join support discord`
#### Examples
https://twitter.com/kawa_entertain/status/1511910027669430276?s=20&t=PkuMlhYZcaC1sbAoPhMdcg
https://twitter.com/Robpoke/status/1521468493857800197?s=20&t=PkuMlhYZcaC1sbAoPhMdcg
#### Notable Current Features
- VR head movement transferred to a Live2D avatar. - Automatic eye blinking setup. - Use your microphone to control your Live2D avatar's mouth movement. - In-game quick access menu for swapping models and activating hotkeys on the fly.
#### Planned Features
- Gesture-based expression activation. - Improve UI customization options, especially the quick access menu. - Improve the hand tracking data passed to Vtube Studio. - Send finger tracking if the controller supports it to Vtube Studio. - Send controller rotation information to Vtube Studio. - Add play space tracking.
#### Current Limitations
- Hand tracking data doesn't include controller rotation or finger tracking. - Very limited customization for quick access hand menu.
#### Setup Instructions
- Start Vtube Studio\* and turn on plugins - Start SteamVR (and make sure all controllers are properly connected) - Unzip the downloaded file and start the "ViewLink VR to Live2D.exe" - Configure the application through the SteamVR dashboard
_ViewLink is free to be used in any context (including commercial), but redistribution or resale is strictly prohibited._
_\*Vtube Studio must be purchased separately in order to use this application._

entry.title: Ultra Wiggly Cat Ears
entry.content:
Want satisfying ear wiggles when you blink? Floofy physics every turn? Get yourself these VTube Studio color-customizable cat ears!ðŸ’–
https://twitter.com/k1ruse/status/1550556818715586561?s=20&t=4oleqjl6tCLj8Z6jbzsjHA
##### You CAN change the colors in VTS:
When you load a new item in, press "configure/finetune", and on the next page after hitting "save", you can edit colors to match your own model using the "multiply/screen" feature!
##### File includes:
- Cat Ear VTS item files (.moc3, .cdi3, .model3, .phsyics3, texture file, .vtube) - Terms and Conditions.txt (+ how to change the colors in VTS)
##### Before purchasing:
- I highly suggest testing VTube Studio's existing Live2D animal ear items to see if this will attach well to your model. Pinning items can be tricky to get right. - This asset acts as a "Live2D sticker" above or behind your model, this will not work as well above horns or similar head accessories!
##### Terms & Conditions:
- Do not redistribute or resell the file or its contents. - Do not rip the art and use it in any way not pertaining to this asset. - You may edit and customize the colors of the item in VTube Studio, as well as on the texture file. Please keep texture file edits to simple color changes/adding accessories (piercings, etc). - If you are using this asset often, please credit me on the about page of your streaming platform of choice. Along with a link to the product page!
---
_With your purchase of my files, please respect the terms that come with it. Your integrity is extremely appreciated._
Kiru [@k1ruse](https://ko-fi.com/k1ruse)
Twitter: [twitter.com/k1ruse](https://twitter.com/k1ruse)
Carrd: [k1ruse.carrd.co](https://k1ruse.carrd.co/)

entry.title: Concert Twitch Overlay
entry.content:
If you are failing to connect to twitch after filling everything out, look at this:
On the twitch token page, double check that the following permissions are checked Yes (it randomly unchecks some):
* bits:read * chat:read * channel:read:subscriptions * channel:read:redemptions * user:read:follows **Having any of these settings unchecked will result in a Twitch Connection error**
An overlay that allows Twitch streamers to have an interactive audience that performs wotagei. Users can customize when and how animations are triggers, and they can replace the audience members, lightsticks, and bits burst with their own images.
Any questions can be directed at me via twitter or put in the comments below.
https://twitter.com/LuaVLucky/status/1420777605985234953?s=20&t=JuN5SnquaCKn3f4ftJmGYQ

entry.title: Steering Wheel and Hat Vtuber LIVE2D RIGGED assets
entry.content:
Made by 0ji_vt and Gomi
Steering Wheel and Hat inspired by Mario Kart! This is a Live2d rigged vtuber asset for vtube studio. Not a png or animated gif.
Make sure to adjust the x and y angles. So the angles of the hat fit your model!
Also, make sure to adjust the "x and y shift". So that the hat is centered on your head when you turn so it doesn't fall off your vtuber models head
Change letter on hat: Left shift + Letter
Turn off lights on steering wheel: Left shift + 1
_No redistributing! or reselling!_

entry.title: Yukarinette ConnectorNeo
entry.content:
Yukarinet Connector Neo is a communication tool that can translate from voice to a multitude of languages all in real-time. The perfect tool to help bring your live streams to a wider audience.
#### Instructions
[**How to use it is explained here.**](https://translate.google.com/website?sl=ja&tl=en&hl=en&client=webapp&u=https://www.machanbazaar.com/2021/11/29/ync_neo_doc/)
We have made it as easy to use as possible, but there are a few steps involved in linking with smartphones, so please read the manual and give it a try.
In addition, if it does not work as expected even after reading the manual, you can submit a bug report to [this community](https://discord.com/invite/h4r5HnR).

entry.title: vTuber Kit
entry.content:
VTubing is fun and awesome and cool! But for people looking to get into it, there can be steep prices. If you're not up for using a pre-made model, vTubers just starting out will most likely look into commissioning a custom model and rig, running anywhere from hundreds to thousands of dollars. But! What if someone wants to dip their toes in the VTubing scene without spending money, while also showing off their own personalized design? Well, that's where VTuber Kit comes in.
vTuber kit is an all-in-one solution. It comes with OpenSeeFace integrated, meaning you will be able to open the program and instantly have camera facial tracking as well as microphone input good to go.
And of course, VTuber Kit's main draw point is model customization. VTuber Kit is stuffed full of various parts to mix and match to create your own personal flair, with much more planned to be added soon. Users can customize colors, mix-and-match clothes, pick out various hair parts, and slap on accessories to create something they like.
Users can then stream with the character they've made! Since this is being built on top of my own personal vTubing solution, they will also get some benefits like Twitch integrations for redeeming headpats using the Twitch Channel points system if they choose to do so. Users will be free to take what they've made and use that design when crafting their own personal model/rig in the future if they so wish.
